title: Getting St. Peter's Sermon Right
itunes:title: Getting St. Peter's Sermon Right
description: Friends, in today’s first reading, St. Peter tells us that there is no salvation outside of Christ. In this homily, I encourage you to let the truth of St. Peter’s statement, which challenges modern sensibilities, sink in—and further explore what this means precisely for both Christians and non-Christians.
